title: P Diagram Generator
description: Build signal/control/noise/outputs P-Diagrams with inline editing, presets, and SVG/PNG/PDF export.

title: Reliability Block Diagram (RBD) Generator
description: Build reliability block diagrams from a table, compute Series/Parallel reliability, and export SVG/CSV diagrams.

title: Arrhenius Calculator
description: Calculate acceleration factor (AF) using the Arrhenius equation.

title: Coffin-Manson Calculator
description: Estimate fatigue life under cyclic thermal loading.

description: Determine required sample size or reliability/confidence using the binomial distribution.

title: Electromigration Lifetime Calculator

title: Derating Navigator
